content:
Thank you for providing the job description, [Albornozmcea@gmail.com](mailto:Albornozmcea@gmail.com). Based on the information you have provided, here is a draft cover letter that you can use to apply for the position of Senior Backend Engineer:

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to apply for the position of Senior Backend Engineer at your company. I am a highly experienced backend software developer with a strong background in building scalable developer-centric APIs and backend systems.

In my current role at NarnajaX, I have been leading the backend efforts of the benefits squad to improve the response times and availability of multiple services. I have also designed and implemented architectural improvements that have significantly reduced turnaround times for our most critical workflows. Additionally, I have supervised the simplification and improvement of our most consumed APIs to improve the developer experience for the rest of the organization.

In my previous role at Novolabs, I was responsible for overseeing the standardization of the development process, and I led a team of developers in implementing and deploying multiple projects. Before that, I worked at PwC Buenos Aires, where I led the Emerging Technologies team and was involved in several projects focused on business automation and legacy systems migration.

I believe that my experience and skills make me a strong candidate for the position of Senior Backend Engineer at your company. I have 5+ years of professional experience building backend applications using languages such as Python, Java, and JavaScript, and I have 4+ years of experience working with Python. I also have a deep knowledge of AWS services and have experience with building highly scalable event-driven and realtime systems.

I am excited about the opportunity to join your team and contribute to the success of your company. Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss this further with you.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
